I

impact() - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.entities.Brick
This method is called by setImpact() method to decrement the strength of the brick and determine if the brick is broken.
impact() - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.entities.SteelBrick
This method is called by setImpact() to determine if the steel brick has been impacted using a rng factor after impacted by a ball.
impact(Point2D, Brick.ImpactDirection) - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.entities.BlackStoneBrick
This method is called by setImpact() to determine if the black stone brick has been impacted using a rng factor after impacted by a ball and set a crack path on the black stone brick position if it is not broken.
impactBrick(Brick, Ball) - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.game.GameLogic
This method is called by impactWall() to determine the direction of the ball impact on the bricks.
InfoMenuController - Class in brickdestroyer.controller
Info Menu Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the Info Menu in the game of Brick Destroyer.
InfoMenuController(SceneManager) - Constructor for class brickdestroyer.controller.InfoMenuController
 
initialiseBallSpeed() - Method in class brickdestroyer.model.game.GameLogic
This method is called to initialize the starting x and y speed of the ball using a rng factor.
